DOC.detailed_description: A randomize control study 200 pregnant woman idiopathic oligohydramnios 28 32 week . Women randomize receive 3 mg warfarin daily ( Warfarin group ) placebo ( Placebo group ) . Outcomes include amniotic fluid index ( AFI ) , duration pregnancy perinatal outcomes include Apgar score , Neonatal intensive care admission ( NICU ) .
